dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener just wrote in, asking about planning a trip to Astana next summer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener just wrote in, asking about planning a trip to Astana next summer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, perfect timing, because uh, Kazakhstanis are gonna have a nice long weekend in July 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, perfect timing, because uh, Kazakhstanis are gonna have a nice long weekend in July twenty twenty five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis can expect long holidays in July 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. Capital Day is on July 6th, which is a Sunday, so the day off actually moves to Monday the 7th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. Capital Day is on July sixth, which is a Sunday, so the day off actually moves to Monday the seventh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since July 6 falls on a Sunday, the day off is moved to Monday, July 7, in accordance with the law "On Holidays."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So that means if you've got a five-day workweek, you get Saturday the 5th, Sunday the 6th, and Monday the 7th off. Three days in a row!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So that means if you've got a five-day workweek, you get Saturday the fifth, Sunday the sixth, and Monday the seventh off. Three days in a row!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, those with a five-day workweek will have three consecutive days off: July 5, 6, and 7.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a great chance to celebrate the capital's history, since it marks when it moved from Almaty to Astana back in 1998.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a great chance to celebrate the capital's history, since it marks when it moved from Almaty to Astana back in nineteen ninety eight.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In July 2025, Kazakhstanis will enjoy extra time off in honor of one of the country's main public holidays " Capital Day, celebrated annually on July 6 to mark the transfer of the capital from Almaty to Astana in 1998.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Tengrinews.kz even put together a calendar to help people plan around it, which is super handy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: the website even put together a calendar to help people plan around it, which is super handy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tengrinews.kz has prepared a handy calendar to help plan your leisure in advance and not miss the days off.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And for anyone working a six-day week, they still get that Monday off, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And for anyone working a six-day week, they still get that Monday off, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, the holiday applies to everyone, but the long weekend is really for those on the five-day schedule.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, the holiday applies to everyone, but the long weekend is really for those on the five-day schedule.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, there are a few professional holidays in July too, though those aren't public holidays, so no extra days off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, there are a few professional holidays in July too, though those aren't public holidays, so no extra days off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Professional holidays in July (not public holidays):

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, a three-day break in the middle of summer? Can't complain about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, a three-day break in the middle of summer? Can't complain about that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely not. Makes me wanna look up flights, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely not. Makes me wanna look up flights, honestly.
